Summary: A paraplegic Marine is sent to Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to undo Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe.
A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
Three decades after the defeat of the Galactic Empire, a new threat arises. Rey, a scavenger, and Finn, an ex-stormtrooper, join forces with Han Solo to defeat it.
The Avengers and their allies must sacrifice all to attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.
With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help, but the spell goes wrong, unleashing dangerous foes from other worlds.
A new theme park, built on the original site of Jurassic Park, creates a genetically modified hybrid dinosaur, which escapes containment and goes on a killing spree.
After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.
Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.
Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf, and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest in an enchanted land to uncover the origin of Elsa's powers.
